title: Watch Pa Salieu’s Videos for New Songs “Epiphany (Freestyle)” and “Crash (Freestyle)”
description: The British Gambian rapper is back with two more tracks after last month’s “Belly”
author: Walden Green
excerpt: The British Gambian rapper is back with two more tracks after last month’s “Belly”
text: The British Gambian rapper is back with two more tracks after last month’s “Belly”Pa Salieu has shared two new songs. “Epiphany (Freestyle)” and “Crash (Freestyle)” follow last month’s “Belly,” which celebrated the British Gambian rapper’s release from prison, after serving 22 months of a 33-month sentence. html:
The British Gambian rapper is back with two more tracks after last month’s “Belly”

Pa Salieu has shared two new songs. “Epiphany (Freestyle)” and “Crash (Freestyle)” follow last month’s “Belly,” which celebrated the British Gambian rapper’s release from prison, after serving 22 months of a 33-month sentence. Both songs come with music videos, and feature Salieu rapping over beats from longtime collaborators Felix Joseph and AOD. Watch the new videos below.

“While I was in jail, I realised how fortunate I was to always have my thoughts for company,” Salieu said in a press statement. “My mind was my escape, and I fell in love with the pen and paper and that’s when I had an epiphany—I have a voice, a platform, and something meaningful to say.”

Revisit the review of Pa Salieu’s debut mixtape, Send Them to Coventry.
